channel.title: Comments for page "The Tunnel of Love"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Tunnel of Love"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
With the new trophies, there's two new messages.

No teammates (first time only?)
You float through, all by yourself. The Jutsu Lady watches you, shaking her head sadly. :(

One teammate (first time?)
The boat silenty sweeps into the dark tunnel.

When you come out of the other end of the Tunnel, well, let's say that you are definitely hanging out with each other for the rest of the day - after getting that out of your system, you can't think of much else you'd want to do. :)

Getting the first, as before, does not use up the Tunnel use for the month.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Bawww, otherwise that would have been fun. Not as useful now…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It was bugged for a while there to let you use it as many times as you wanted to. The bug was fixed by the end.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Once per festival? I did it more than once, I believe…and I wasn't allowed on the bargletron or snack stand again, so I'm wondering if it's really once per festival.
